The STREAM_ID_MAP structure describes an elementary stream within an MPEG-2 program stream. Used with the interface methods.

member.name: STREAM_ID_MAP.stream_id
member.summary: Specifies the ID of the PES stream.

summary.para: Specifies the media contents of the stream. May be one of the following values defined in axextend.idl:

member.name: STREAM_ID_MAP.ulSubstreamFilterValue
member.summary: Specifies the substream within the elementary stream. If no substream filtering is required, use SUBSTREAM_FILTER_VAL_NONE (0x10000000).

member.name: STREAM_ID_MAP.iDataOffset
member.summary: Specifies the offset in bytes for the substream. If no filtering is required, specify 0.
